name: fabric-signcert
title: Fabric Signcert
description: This activity returns the signature certificate of a user@org
author: TIBCO Lab

inputs.name: userName
inputs.description: client user name of an organization, e.g., Admin@org1 or User1; if org is not specified, use client org in the network config

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: result can be array or JSON object
